inputs.name: openshiftService
inputs.label: OpenShift service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select OpenShift service connection to use.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version of oc to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the oc version to use e.g. 'v3.10.0' (leave blank for latest). You can also specify a direct URL to a oc release bundle.

inputs.name: cmd
inputs.label: Command to run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the oc command to run.

inputs.name: ignoreFlag
inputs.label: Ignore non success return value
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if the non success return value of the oc command run has to be ignored. E.g if the command oc create/delete/... fail because the resource has already been created/deleted/.. the pipeline will continue its execution

inputs.name: uselocalOc
inputs.label: use local oc executable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if oc is already installed in the machine and use that if available
